text: Vaskë Ruko (born 15 July 1977) is an Albanian retired footballer who played for Apolonia Fier, Këlcyra and Albpetrol Patos.Albania 2000–01Albania 2001–02Albania 2002–03Albania 2003–04Albania 2004–05Albania 2006–07 ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Fier Category:Association football forwards Category:Albanian footballers Category:KF Apolonia Fier players Category:KF Këlcyra players Category:KS Albpetrol Patos players Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Albanian First Division players
title: Vaskë Ruko
